description.title: (v0.5.2)-スナップショット
bullets: Added Webnovel Parser.

description.title: (v0.5.3)-スナップショット
bullets: Added Volume Card

description.title: (v0.5.4)-スナップショット
bullets: Added markdown library (showdown)
Wordcount Patch
Footer Change

description.title: (v0.5.6)-スナップショット
bullets: Webnovel is a bit more flexible.
It can handle more volumes in the future!

description.title: (v0.6.0)-スナップショット
bullets: Fixed all console errors! (I hope)
Formatted content warning, added buttons.

description.title: (v0.7.0)-スナップショット
bullets: Moved the site from Github Pages to Cloudflare Pages.
Should expect faster loading times!

description.title: Wiki Update
bullets: Work in progress 'Zsasz' article added to Wiki.
Not a lot there, I'll add more about him at some point!

description.title: (v0.8.0)-スナップショット
bullets: Event descriptions!

description.title: (v0.8.2)-スナップショット
bullets: Added tag functionality to the webnovel
Added an actual content warning to the placeholder.
Tried to fix what happens when a small phone rotates

description.title: Wiki Update
bullets: Added Heather and Leo to the wiki
Didn't add too much, just art, species details, and formatting.
Made collapsible sections. Removed search descriptions.

description.title: (v0.8.3)-スナップショット
bullets: Moved the nav circles to the top.
Moved feedback to the footer.

description.title: (v0.8.5)-スナップショット
bullets: Cut down 172 lines of code for the webnovel.
Fixed bug where chapter content displays while viewing volume cards
Removed dependency on showdown converter for chapters.
Used webp for the background art, might be faster?
No longer a single page, working on creating URLs for other areas of the site.

description.title: (v0.8.7)-スナップショット
bullets: (0.8.6) - Fixed a bug where a page doesn't redirect and just fetches inside the main page.
(0.8.7) - Webnovel doesn't require any javascript.
(0.8.7) - Added left sidebar for the wiki.

description.title: (v0.8.8)-スナップショット
bullets: Fixed... breadcrumbs? (Idk)

description.title: (v0.9.0)-スナップショット
bullets: Added 'Vault'. You can find my sketches, art for the wiki, and art from the community there!
Moved credits for images from wiki to vault for simplicity.

description.title: (v0.9.1)-スナップショット
bullets: Added a loading spinner for the gallery
Testing out a feature where you can jump from an image in the wiki to the gallery to see credits. (Only works for Leo)
Using fallbacks again for images instead of locally storing them. Well, at least for the gallery.
Updated Leo from cat to leopard.

description.title: (v0.9.1.5)-スナップショット
bullets: You can now click on an image in the wiki and it'll show you the credits, plus it won't take you directly to the gallery page.
[Known Bug] Some issues with the CSS for the gallery images.
Calendar now has all events inside of 1 json instead of fetching html

description.title: (v0.9.1.8)-スナップショット
bullets: CSS issues with gallery images are fixed and look much better, on both the wiki and the gallery.
Added search box, and first instance of tags- Character, Artist, and Image Code
Successfully fixed issue where gallery images weren't working in wiki.
